Which guests had the most appearances on Hot Ones?

Code 
episodes |>
  count(guest) |>
  arrange(desc(n)) |>
  head(20)
# A tibble: 20 × 2
   guest              n

Sauces by their scoville value across seasons

Code 
sauces |> 
  filter(season == 1) |>
  mutate(sauce_name = fct_reorder(sauce_name, scoville)) |>
  ggplot(aes(sauce_name, scoville)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip()
